T16D4361:228b-0: @228b ` // sangs rgyas gtso bo'i rgya cher 'grel pa bzhugs /
T16D4361:228b-2: # // sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4361:228b-3: skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4361:228b-5: gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4361:228b-6: sangs rgyas la don rnam pa lngas bstan te /
T16D4361:228b-8: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-9: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-10: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-11: bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-12: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T16D4361:228b-13: de ltar don rnam pa lngas bstan to //
T16D4361:228b-14: de la tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs zhes 'byung bas rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:228b-15: tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis yin te /
T16D4361:228b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshogs gnyis su 'dus te /
T16D4361:228b-18: de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-19: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-20: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-21: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang nas /
T16D4361:228b-22: byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T16D4361:228b-23: lha'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
T16D4361:228b-24: brtson 'grus kyi cha gcig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs su bsdu /
T16D4361:228b-25: bsam gtan gyi nang nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sogs te /
T16D4361:228b-26: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T16D4361:228b-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T16D4361:228b-28: brtson 'grus kyi cha gcig ni ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ste /
T16D4361:228b-29: de ltar na tshogs chen po gnyis rdzogs pas ni rgyu phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T16D4361:228b-30: mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub ces pas ni /
T16D4361:228b-31: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:228b-32: mkhyen bzhi ni ye shes bzhi la bya ste gang zhe na /
T16D4361:228b-33: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T16D4361:228b-34: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T16D4361:228b-35: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T16D4361:228b-36: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang bzhi'o //
T16D4361:228b-37: de yang dngos gang zhe na /
T16D4361:228b-38: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad gnas gyur na /
T16D4361:228b-40: de la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur na /
T16D4361:228b-41: me long lta bu'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T16D4361:228b-42: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur na /
T16D4361:228b-43: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T16D4361:229a-0: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na yid kyi rnam par shes pa @229a * //
T16D4361:229a-2: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T16D4361:229a-3: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa ni /
T16D4361:229a-4: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T16D4361:229a-5: de ltar na ye shes bzhi ni de dag go //
T16D4361:229a-6: sku gsum ni chos kyi sku dang /
T16D4361:229a-7: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T16D4361:229a-8: sprul pa'i sku dang gsum mo //
T16D4361:229a-9: de rnams kyang gang zhe na /
T16D4361:229a-10: ye shes bzhi dang sku gsum dang sbyar na /
T16D4361:229a-11: me long lta bu'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku dang sbyar te /
T16D4361:229a-12: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T16D4361:229a-13: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sbyar ro //
T16D4361:229a-14: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang /
T16D4361:229a-16: de ltar sku gsum dang ye shes bzhi po 'di
T16D4361:229a-17: dag ni rgyu tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin
T16D4361:229a-18: pa'i phyir ro // 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o //
T16D4361:229a-19: rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa ler mkhyen //
T16D4361:229a-21: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:229a-22: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi
T16D4361:229a-23: rang bzhin ni rnam par rtog pa ni rdul tsam
T16D4361:229a-25: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T16D4361:229a-30: nang bcud kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
T16D4361:229a-31: chos ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ji
T16D4361:229a-32: lta ba bzhin ma nor bar skyu ru ra phyag
T16D4361:229a-33: mthil du gzhag pa bzhin du sa ler mkhyen pa'i
T16D4361:229a-34: phyir / rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa ler mkhyen //
T16D4361:229a-36: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin no //
T16D4361:229a-37: chos sku mkha' 'dra gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan //
T16D4361:229a-39: bdag cag gi don phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
T16D4361:229a-40: de la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku ni gzugs can ma yin pa /
T16D4361:229a-41: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T16D4361:229a-42: spros pa thams cad las 'das pa yang dag pa ji lta bur yang dmigs su med pa ste /
T16D4361:229a-43: dper na nam mkha' ji lta bur yang dmigs su med pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
T16D4361:229a-45: gzugs sku ni gdul bya so so kun gyi rnam
T16D4361:229a-46: par rig pa ji ltar mos shing dad pa bzhin
T16D4361:229b-0: du mdzes par snang @229b ba'i phyir /
T16D4361:229b-1: gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ste /
T16D4361:229b-2: de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon
T16D4361:229b-3: par rdzogs par byang chub pa chen po 'og min
T16D4361:229b-4: gyi gnas na / byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po la bzhugs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor na /
T16D4361:229b-5: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ;
T16D4361:229b-6: / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan zhing /
T16D4361:229b-7: chos la longs spyod par mdzad pa dang /
T16D4361:229b-8: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la byang chub sems
T16D4361:229b-9: dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams
T16D4361:229b-10: dang / 'phags pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i 'khor
T16D4361:229b-11: gyi dkyil 'khor na mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa
T16D4361:229b-12: dang / gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te /
T16D4361:229b-13: rab tu byung ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa dang /
T16D4361:229b-14: gzhan yang 'gro ba'i ris lnga so so'i lus dang
T16D4361:229b-15: mthun par mdzes par sku sna tshogs su ston pa'i
T16D4361:229b-16: phyir / gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ste /
T16D4361:229b-17: de dag ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T16D4361:229b-18: sangs rgyas dpag bsam 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4361:229b-19: zhes bya ba 'byung bas ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:229b-20: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyi shing ngam /
T16D4361:229b-21: yid bzhin gyi nur bu rin po che dang 'dra ste /
T16D4361:229b-22: dper na dpag bsam gyi shing dang yid bzhin gyi
T16D4361:229b-23: nor bu rin po che ni rtog pa rdul tsam
T16D4361:229b-24: yang med na yang skal ba can gang zhig gis
T16D4361:229b-28: smyon pas dran pa rnyed pa la sogs pa yon
T16D4361:229b-29: tan gzhan yang grang ba'i dus na dro zhing 'jam
T16D4361:229b-30: pa dang / tsha zhing gdung ba'i dus na bsel
T16D4361:229b-31: ba la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod cing smon pa'i
T16D4361:229b-32: don thams cad yid bzhin du byed pa dang /
T16D4361:229b-33: grub par nges pa dang 'dra bar sku gsum rnam
T16D4361:229b-34: pa sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don
T16D4361:229b-35: yid bzhin du grub par mdzad pas /
T16D4361:229b-36: sangs rgyas dpag bsam 'dra zhes bya ste /
T16D4361:229b-37: de ltar sangs rgyas dkon mchog la don lngas bstan to //
T16D4361:229b-38: chos dkon mchog la don bzhis bstan te /
T16D4361:229b-40: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:229b-41: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:229b-42: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:230a-2: chos dbyings rgyu mthun zhes 'byung bas na /
T16D4361:230a-3: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:230a-4: de la dbyings zhes bya ba ni /
T16D4361:230a-5: rgya gar gyi sgra las drangs na dh'a tu zhes 'byung /
T16D4361:230a-6: dh'a tu bod skad du bzlog na dbyings zhes 'byung ste /
T16D4361:230a-7: dbyings kyi don ni rgyu'i don te /
T16D4361:230a-8: dbyings kyi rgyu'i don de yang gang zhe na /
T16D4361:230a-9: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid stong pa bdag med pa la bya ste /
T16D4361:230a-10: chos nyid stong pa de ji ltar rgyu yin zhe na /
T16D4361:230a-11: chos kyi dbyings stong pa bdag med pa de la dmigs pas /
T16D4361:230a-12: de rtogs pa las gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la sogs pa bshad pa'i chos dang /
T16D4361:230a-13: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa lam gyi chos dang /
T16D4361:230a-15: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos dang /
T16D4361:230a-16: mdor na yon tan gyi phyogs mtha' dag 'byung ba'i
T16D4361:230a-17: gzhir gyur ba'i phyir chos la dbyings sam rgyu zhes
T16D4361:230a-18: bya'o // gsung rab bcu gnyis zhes 'byung bas /
T16D4361:230a-19: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa ston to //
T16D4361:230a-20: mdo'i sde la sogs pa gsung rab bcu gnyis ni
T16D4361:230a-21: chos kyi dbyings te rtogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras
T16D4361:230a-23: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T16D4361:230a-24: chos nyid skye 'gag med cing spros las dben //
T16D4361:230a-26: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:230a-27: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ni gzod ma nas ma byung ma skyes pa /
T16D4361:230a-28: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba yin la /
T16D4361:230a-29: de ltar yang dag par ma skyes na /
T16D4361:230a-31: skye 'gag gyi rtag chad yod med la sogs pa'i
T16D4361:230a-32: spros pa'i mtha' thams cad las dben pa'i rang bzhin
T16D4361:230a-33: yin pas / chos nyid skye 'gag med cing spros las dben //
T16D4361:230a-35: de la dmigs te yon tan kun grub pa //
T16D4361:230a-36: legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4361:230a-38: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:230a-39: chos kyi dbyings spros pa med par bstan pa dang /
T16D4361:230a-40: de rtogs pa las 'byung ba gsung rab yan lag
T16D4361:230a-41: bcu gnyis po de la dmigs shing goms par byas
T16D4361:230a-42: na / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T16D4361:230a-43: yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i
T16D4361:230b-0: na / @230b phyir / de la dmigs nas yon tan kun grub pa yin la /
T16D4361:230b-1: de ltar yon tan grub pa'i gzhi 'am dmigs par
T16D4361:230b-2: gyur pa de nyid legs pa thams cad 'thob pa'i
T16D4361:230b-3: rgyu yin pas / de legs pa thams cad kyi
T16D4361:230b-4: rgyu gyur ba'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bstan
T16D4361:230b-5: rgyu yin pas / te / de ltar chos dkon mchog la don bzhis bstan to //
T16D4361:230b-6: dge 'dun dkon mchog la don lngas bstan to //
T16D4361:230b-8: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-9: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-10: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-11: bdag gi don phun sum tshos pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-12: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-13: de ltar rnam pa lngas bstan te /
T16D4361:230b-15: nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag / gnyen pos rim par zhes 'byung bas /
T16D4361:230b-16: rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:230b-17: sgrib pa mtha' dag mdor bsdu na /
T16D4361:230b-18: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-19: shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis su 'dus so //
T16D4361:230b-20: de la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni 'dod chags dang /
T16D4361:230b-22: gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa drug dang /
T16D4361:230b-23: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu la bya /
T16D4361:230b-24: shes bya'i sgrib pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste /
T16D4361:230b-25: dngos su gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-26: rig pa'i gnas lnga la sogs pa mi shes pa la bya /
T16D4361:230b-27: de'i gnyen po ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
T16D4361:230b-28: pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T16D4361:230b-30: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T16D4361:230b-31: theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i dbu ma'i lam dang /
T16D4361:230b-32: rig pa'i gnas lnga la sogs pa lam la sogs pa la mkhas pa la bya /
T16D4361:230b-33: rim par bsal te sar bzhugs pa //
T16D4361:230b-34: zhes 'byung bas ni 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:230b-35: gnyen po gong du smos pa des mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-36: shes bya'i sgrub pa mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rim gyis spangs pa'i 'bras bu /
T16D4361:230b-37: sa la bzhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po rab tu dga' ba dang /
T16D4361:230b-38: sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-39: sa gsum pa 'od byed pa dang /
T16D4361:230b-41: sa lnga ba shin tu sbyang dka' ba dang /
T16D4361:230b-42: sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa dang /
T16D4361:231a-2: sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba dang /
T16D4361:231a-3: sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros dang /
T16D4361:231a-4: sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin te /
T16D4361:231a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /
T16D4361:231a-7: rang rgyal ba'i dge 'dun skyes bu chen po zung
T16D4361:231a-8: bzhi gang zag ya brgyad sa bdun gyis bsdus te
T16D4361:231a-9: / dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /
T16D4361:231a-14: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /
T16D4361:231a-15: byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa ste /
T16D4361:231a-16: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /
T16D4361:231a-17: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa bdun dang /
T16D4361:231a-18: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T16D4361:231a-19: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la rim bzhin du
T16D4361:231a-20: bzhugs pa ni 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yin
T16D4361:231a-21: no // sems can don mdzad ces 'byung bas ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:231a-22: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun sa la rim bzhin du bzhugs pa'i phrin las ni /
T16D4361:231a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas thabs rnam pa sna
T16D4361:231a-24: tshogs kyis sems can gyi don kho na mdzad de
T16D4361:231a-25: / 'di ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
T16D4361:231a-26: sangs rgyas zhing sbyong ba zhes 'byung bas ni /
T16D4361:231a-27: bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:231a-28: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis te /
T16D4361:231a-30: nang bcud kyi 'jig rten dang gnyis so //
T16D4361:231a-31: de dag sbyong ba ni phyi snod kyi 'jig rten ngam grol dang /
T16D4361:231a-33: tsha sgo can la sogs te /
T16D4361:231a-34: ma dag pa rnams la gser la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs dang /
T16D4361:231a-36: padma can la sogs pa yon tan sna tshogs dang
T16D4361:231a-37: ldan par 'gyur bar bsgrub pa ni phyi snod kyi
T16D4361:231a-38: 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba yin no
T16D4361:231a-39: // nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'gro ba rigs lngas
T16D4361:231a-40: bsdus pa sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba
T16D4361:231a-42: mi dge ba bcu la gnas pa rnams dge ba bcu la dgod pa dang /
T16D4361:231a-43: rnam par g-yeng ba rnams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la dgod pa dang /
T16D4361:231a-44: 'khor ba pa rnams 'phags pa'i lam dang /
T16D4361:231a-45: byang chub gsum gyi 'bras bu la dgod par byed pa dang /
T16D4361:231b-0: rang sems rgyud @231b sbyong ba ste ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba zhes bya zhe na /
T16D4361:231b-1: de rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud sbyang ba las /
T16D4361:231b-2: sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'am skye ba'i phyir /
T16D4361:231b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhes bya ste /
T16D4361:231b-4: dper na zhing las nas skye ba bzhin no //
T16D4361:231b-5: skabs 'dir gtsor yang rang gi sems sbyang ba la bya /
T16D4361:231b-6: rang gi sems sbyang ba yang gzhan gyi don byas pas 'grub po //
T16D4361:231b-7: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun che zhes bya bas ni /
T16D4361:231b-8: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T16D4361:231b-9: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad kyi rang bzhin na /
T16D4361:231b-10: rgyu las dang nyan mongs pa dang /
T16D4361:231b-11: 'bras bu sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad la sogs te /
T16D4361:231b-12: 'khor ba'i nyes pa'i skyon thams cad las 'phags pa yin la /
T16D4361:231b-13: 'phags pa de lta bu mang po 'dus pa la dge 'dun zhes bya /
T16D4361:231b-14: che zhes 'byung ba yang gnyis te /
T16D4361:231b-16: mthu che ba dang grangs mang bas che ba'o //
T16D4361:231b-17: de la mthu che ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
T16D4361:231b-18: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa la sogs pa'i dgra
T16D4361:231b-20: lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa bdud bzhi'i tshogs thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing /
T16D4361:231b-21: 'phags par mdzad pas na mthu che ba yin no //
T16D4361:231b-22: stong nyis brgya la sogs pa mang du bzhugs pas grangs kyis che ba yin no //
T16D4361:231b-23: de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin te /
T16D4361:231b-24: de ltar dge 'dun dkon mchog la don lngas bstan to //
T16D4361:231b-25: de ltar dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T16D4361:231b-27: sems dang ba dang mos pa chen pos phyag byas na /
T16D4361:231b-30: sangs rgyas gtso'i t'i ka rgya cher 'grel pa bod
T16D4361:231b-31: kyi lo ts'a ba zhang ye shes sdes mdzad pa
